import { Component, HostListener, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Observable, of } from 'rxjs'; import { UnsplashService } from '../unsplash.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-unsplash', // template: //`
`, templateUrl: './unsplash.component.html', styleUrls: ['./unsplash.component.scss'], styles:[] }) export class UnsplashComponent implements OnInit { photos: any = []; page = 1; loading = true; constructor(private unsplashService: UnsplashService) {} ngOnInit() { this.loadMore(); this.loading = false; } @HostListener('window:scroll', ['$event']) onWindowScroll() { if ((window.innerHeight + window.scrollY) >= document.body.offsetHeight) { this.loadMore(); } } loadMore() { this.unsplashService.getPhotos(this.page).subscribe(photos => { this.photos = this.photos.concat(photos); this.page++; }); } cargar() { this.loading = true; this.page +=1; this.unsplashService.getPhotos(this.page++).subscribe(_photos => { this.photos = this.photos.concat(_photos); this.loading = false; }); } }
